articles.title: Riot police clash with hooligans during Pride march in Serbian capital - CBC News
articles.description: Riot police clashed Saturday with soccer hooligans in downtown Belgrade, where a pan-European Pride march was held despite threats from anti-gay groups and an official earlier ban on the march in the traditionally conservative Balkan state.
articles.content: Riot police clashed Saturday with soccer hooligans in downtown Belgrade, where a pan-European Pride march was held despite threats from anti-gay groups and an official earlier ban on the march in the… [+2878 chars]

articles.title: Hungary to submit new laws to unlock EU funds next week - Reuters
articles.description: Hungary's government will submit new laws to parliament next week to end a stand-off with the European Commission and unlock access to European Union funds, Prime Minister Viktor Orban's chief of staff said on Saturday.
articles.content: BUDAPEST, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Hungary's government will submit new laws to parliament next week to end a stand-off with the European Commission and unlock access to European Union funds, Prime Minist… [+2147 chars]

articles.title: Recapping and mite removal behaviour in Cuba: home to the world's largest population of Varroa-resistant European honeybees | Scientific Reports - Nature.com
articles.description: Scientific Reports - Recapping and mite removal behaviour in Cuba: home to the world’s largest population of Varroa-resistant European honeybees
